mapper.select: SELECT c.cart_seq, c.art_code_seq, c.member_code_seq, c.art_option_seq, c.art_count, c.order_request, w.writer_brand_name, w.writer_send_price, w.writer_sendfree_case, a.art_photo, a.art_name, a.art_price, a.art_discount FROM cart_tb c, writer_tb w, art_tb a WHERE c.art_code_seq=a.art_code_seq AND a.writer_code_seq=w.writer_code_seq AND c.member_code_seq=#{memberCode} ORDER BY cart_seq
SELECT art_option_seq, art_option_category, art_option_name, art_option_price FROM art_option_tb WHERE art_option_seq =#{artOption}
SELECT art_count FROM cart_tb WHERE cart_seq =#{cartCode}
SELECT c.cart_seq, c.art_code_seq, c.art_option_seq, a.art_name, a.art_photo, a.art_discount, a.art_price FROM art_tb a, cart_tb c WHERE c.art_code_seq = a.art_code_seq AND c.cart_seq=#{cart}
SELECT art_option_seq, art_option_category, art_option_name, art_option_price FROM art_option_tb WHERE art_code_seq =#{art} ORDER BY art_option_seq
mapper.update: UPDATE cart_tb SET art_option_seq=#{option}, art_count=#{count} WHERE cart_seq=#{cart}
